channel.title: New site help
channel.description:
Ok well i am trying to make a game based website, i have got a few style in my head i am very handy with photoshop but i don't know how to code them into a sit, i have all the parts together in one psd and png file, i also have the all in there separate states also in psd and png format, i have done that just in case i needed one and not the other just in case.
well i know a little bit of html don't know if that will help me coding these tho.
can you point me in the right direction on to learn how to code them my self.

item.title: New site help
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

for skins use CSS and html to do it for a new person learn about tags then about some image abd link making then use tables you’ll be ok

Read full topic
